about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a passionate developer with significant experience in web design and development across various projects. Committed to continuous learning to enhance my Full-Stack development skills.
about.experience: My journey spans over 1 year in web development involving a skill set that spans both front-end and back-end technologies
about.final-subtitle: I’m excited about the endless possibilities that technology offers, and I’m always eager to take on new and exciting projects.
